title: Jurassic World: The Experience
description: Visit the Cloud Forest at Gardens by the Bay to see life-sized dinosaurs, including an 8.5-meter-tall Brachiosaurus, a T-Rex, and a petting zoo with baby dinosaurs.

venue.name: Cloud Forest, Gardens by the Bay

title: i Light Singapore 2025
description: Experience multi-sensory light installations at Marina Bay, South Beach, Raffles Place and the Singapore River, featuring 17 light installations in an SG60 theme.

venue.name: Marina Bay, South Beach, Raffles Place & Singapore River

title: Flipside
description: Enjoy free circus performances, comedy shows, acrobatics, aerial shows, and puppetry at Flipside 2025 at the Esplanade.

title: Night at Orchard
description: Shop at the Night at Orchard weekend market, which includes experiential brands and local and international brands.

title: Gallery Children’s Biennale
description: Explore eight multi-sensory installations at the Gallery Children's Biennale at National Gallery Singapore, themed around 'Tomorrow, We’ll Be…', designed for kids of all ages.

title: Monstrous Fun! at The Arts House
description: Attend free kids’ events such as a Monster Parade, arts and crafts activities, a book fair, a Monster Hunt, and balloon sculpting at The Arts House as part of Children’s Season 2025.

venue.name: The Arts House at the Old Parliament

title: Children’s Season at Children’s Museum Singapore
description: Participate in free workshops and craft activities, including building a 'time-travelling machine', crafting paper lighthouses, and painting at the Children’s Museum Singapore.

title: How To Train Your Dragon Toothless Touring Truck
description: Head to multiple malls to participate in Viking riddles and puzzles, play a maze game, craft Viking bracelets and get temporary AR tattoos at the 'How To Train Your Dragon' Toothless Touring Truck.

title: Isle of Berk Viking Village
description: Visit the Isle of Berk Viking Village, which has themed photo spots, craft workshops, a dragon training zone and other games at Bugis+.

title: Mermaid Show at Cosford Container Park
description: Bring your children to Cosford Container Park for a live mermaid show every Saturday and Sunday.

title: GastroBeats 2025
description: Visit GastroBeats 2025, part of i Light Singapore 2025, for a foodie haven with live music and stalls by local creators and small businesses.

title: Jumptopia Lite: Bounce Beyond at Suntec City
description: Let the little ones bounce through inflatable desserts at Suntec City!

title: National Family Festival 2025
description: The National Family Festival 2025 begins this weekend at Singapore EXPO. Enjoy bouncy castles, crafts, challenges, sports trials, and more.

venue.name: Singapore EXPO & Westgate; Kallang Wave Mall; Lot One

title: Children’s Festival 2025 at GBTB
description: Experience the Children's Festival 2025 at Gardens by the Bay, which is themed around Stitch from Disney’s Lilo & Stitch with large-scale installations.

venue.name: Supertree Grove Gardens by the Bay

title: Bluey Outdoor Adventures at SAFRA Punggol
description: Join Bluey and her family at SAFRA Punggol for the June holidays, where you can take part in The Bluey Painting Workshop and snap photos at the Meet & Greet sessions.

title: ACM & Me
description: Explore the new children’s space called ACM & Me at the Asian Civilisations Museum, with three thematic zones for kids to explore.

title: Children's Season at National Museum
description: Enjoy free activities for little ones, including an interactive installation about early migrants, an artefact hunt, character meet-and-greets, and storytelling sessions at the National Museum of Singapore.

title: Stitch at VivoCity
description: Visit VivoCity to take photos at the 626 Party photo zones, including a 4.5-metre-tall Stitch installation, and cop some Stitch march and blind boxes

title: Little SIFA
description: Attend SIFA with free kids’ events in May, including ‘Animal Farm,’ a live puppet show, a kinetic installation called ‘The House Between The Winds,’ and The Purple Symphony live orchestra.

title: Italian Street Food Fair at Baia
description: Enjoy over ten Italian street food offerings from Baia, along with magicians to entertain the kids.

venue.name: Baia Rooftop Dining & Lounge, Esplanade Mall

title: Inclusive market at New Bahru
description: Browse over 70 inclusive vendors at Pasar Pink x Sunday Social at New Bahru, with performances, storytelling, pet parades, and live pro wrestling.

title: Cultural Extravaganza 2025
description: Attend the upcoming Cultural Extravaganza 2025 at the Singapore Chinese Cultural Centre and experience engaging performances for introduction to local Chinese arts and culture.

title: Gateway Kids Club
description: Attend free kids’ storytelling sessions every Saturday at the Gateway Theatre.

title: Movies by the Beach at Sentosa
description: Enjoy free movie screenings every Saturday and Sunday at 7pm at Palawan Kidz City Roof Garden in Sentosa, bringing your picnic blanket and basket.

venue.name: Palawan Kidz City Roof Garden, Sentosa
